评论详情: This is a good quality wallet that gets the job done. Good amount of space for cards and for cash.
Real leather wallet. Love it!
Fantastic craftsmanship and quality. Holds everything that I need to carry every day and is very comfortable in pocket

评论概述: Too tight to put anything in it.
评论详情: You can hardly fit a credit card in it

Good Quality!! However, I wish it an half a cm larger all around, including the pockets. I am frustrated with the difficulty of removing my cards. It fits nicely in my front pocket. I hope that the leather stretches so I can easily remove my cards.
Although I just received this yesterday I am extremely pleased. When I first opened it I thought it would be too small. However, it holds everything I need it to. I recommend this wallet.
It is the perfect size wallet for any occasion!
Made a great gift

评论概述: Sencilla, se ve de calidad, pero un poco pequeña.
评论详情: Me encanta el material. Está nueva, pero se ve muy bonita. Debo decir que es justo lo que quería, pero es más pequeña de lo que pensaba. Entraron tres tarjetas de crédito ajustadas, tres documentos de identidad y otra cosa pequeña. Quedó todo muy ajustado. De por si tiene solo cuatro ranuras. Los billetes no entran extendidos. Le falta medio centímetro para que suceda, no sé por qué no la hicieron un poquito más grande. No es una cartela de lujo ni elegante. Es una cartera para el uso diario con jeans, pero igual es bonita.
Okay
Nice thick leather. Heavy stitching. Definitely worth the price. I might buy a couple more in different colors.

I wanted a wallet that was small enough to carry in my pocket and sturdy enough to last. This wallet fits the bill and then some! Very well made of premium leather and the stitching is sturdy. The leather is thick enough to be stiff at first but is softening with use. Highly recommend.

评论概述: Item needs to be aged somehow it's too hard and tight.
评论详情: See above
Muy poca capacidad y acabado muy rustico.

评论概述: Good quality but the color is starting to fade
评论详情: Quality of stitching is good but the color starts to fade away after a couple of months
Perfect size, nice leather. Basic but beautiful!!
Smaller size good for euro currency. For US dollars kind of small.

评论概述: No RFID protection. Trust the reviews.
评论详情: Slots are a little tight but I expected that, especially since I'm replacing my old wallet because my cards kept falling out. But it literally has no RFID protection. I'm able to tap and pay with my card inside the wallet, without even opening it. I'm also able to badge in at work with the badge in my wallet. I just press it against the reader.  Look. It's a nice wallet. Slim and it takes up almost no room, especially if you don't have a lot of cards. But since it has no RFID protection, you can get a lot nicer wallets for the $20 this one costs.  I'll keep it but I would not buy again.
Have had this wallet for about a month and love it so far. Is breaking in nicely and seems to be very good quality.

5 stars! I'm a student and love this slim, minimalistic leather wallet. It's compact yet stylish, fitting effortlessly in my pocket (even when I'm biking!). Amazon's delivery was spot-on too. A superb blend of functionality and aesthetic - definitely a must-have accessory!

This wallet looks really nice in person! As a plumber, this minimalistic leather wallet is perfect. Fits seamlessly into my work routine, without bulking my pocket as it's pretty slim. Great blend of practicality and style. Highly recommended!"

For me .. this is just barely shy of being a perfect fit only because you can’t put / fit, American currency into the wallet pocket.  Unless you fold them on half. And it’s only about a quarter inch shy ….. lol. Sooooo close.  That said. The leather is great. The simplicity is fantastic. The stitching is quality.  Yeah. Just a touch longer and it hits the mark.
Perfect size to hold credit cards/cash. Small enough to carry it in my front pocket. Real leather. They could make it better by making it RIFD but I still give it 5 stars. Excellent quality
Simple wallet that is well made and perfect for travel.  Definitely would recommend.

I use cash. With that said, the wallet is too short to fold correctly with some bills placed into the bill slot. It bunches up the money and doesn't fold without force. It doesn't hold as much stuff as my last wallet making it thinner only because there is less stuff stuffed into it. I had to remover about 1/2 of the crap I stuffed into my old wallet. The leather is nice and looks like it will last. Stitching looks good. perhaps with time and use things will relax and fit better.
My only complaint is the pocket for cash is very tight and slightly difficult to use. But then again, it’s a minimalist’s wallet. I’m happy

Definitely a great leather. Very thick and smells great. If u love that leather smell this has that. It’s great quality. I’ve been using it for about a week n half now and I have no complaints about the quality. Wish it had a I’d holder but other then that it’s a sturdy wallet that will last. Will buy again.

I got this for my son as his first “grown up” Wallet. The shape is great. You do have to fold cash to fit in, but that’s not a big deal. He really loves it. The color is stunning and it’s a great quality for the price. All in all exactly what was expected. Nice packaging, too.
Really simple and rugged love it
This wallet is very slim and durable.
As advertised

I was looking to replace a leather wallet that just wore out after many years. I came across this one after several that i sent back due to being poor quality and this one is perfect. It fits over 15 credit cards and Id cards. Leather is high quality and craftsmanship is superior!
Perfect size for front pocket carry.

评论概述: A solid, well built minimalist wallet
评论详情: This wallet uses very thick leather and obvious quality craftsmanship in the stitching.  The packaging is very well done as well, making this a great gift idea, just wrap and give.  The interior has 4 credit card/id pockets, you might be able to fit slightly more, but I wouldn’t push it. And there is one bill pocket. Because of the size, you may need to fold the bills to fit in the pocket (and depending on the country of the bills).  This looks and feels like a quality item that will last a long time.
High quality. I was Looking for a stylish and comfy wallet? This one matches my demands perfectly, and I'm extremely happy with the pricing, quality, and design.

In video I have 9 cards, 4 in the individual pockets and the rest in the left hand side area, as well as 8-10 paper bills folded in the right hand side as you’re meant to do.  The leather is thick, feels like great quality, looks rustic, and being a sort of rough leather on the interior sides, it holds everything in there rock solid.  It’s significantly smaller than a normal wallet, nicer, easier to carry around, fits anywhere, and nothing’s falling out of it, no matter what you do. I personally don’t like or carry cash, normally, so I’ll likely move 1/2 of the cards in the left side of the main pocket to the “cash” side, making it even thinner. As it is, though, it’s essentially perfect.
leather quality is very fine. can hold up to four plastic cards and plus cash. smaller then regular wallets, but very practical and stylish

The craftsmanship is perfect. The item comes with an explanation and a kind note from the producer. The leather is soft and the color looks great. The wallet is minimalist. It may hold enough IDs and credit cards but may not be able to carry too many dollar bills.

评论概述: Exactly what I wanted for my wallet!
评论详情: I don't have much I try to ditch needless cards and filler. So I have like 3 cards and rarely carry cash. So this was perfect for me personally not much to say but it had more than enough space for my cards.

The wallet is beautiful. I love the color (the blue one) and the way it feels. I also love that it's compact, but it's too short.  It won't hold any money without folding it because it's too short to do so. While I really like the wallet, if they would have added a half inch or so, it would have been perfect. As it is, not really convenient to use.

评论概述: Wallet CANNOT hold unfolded cash; minimalist, not small
评论详情: I ordered the blue wallet, and it's made out of a sturdy leather. I wouldn't call it small since the leather is kinda thick (but sturdy!), is a bifold wallet, and it doesn't really lie flat -- see pix. But I do think it is a minimalist wallet since its few pockets achieve the same purpose as a regular wallet. When you open the wallet, you have two slots on each side, one side has horizontal slots, the other has vertical card slots. Mine comfortably holds 6 cards, and it's still easy to take cards in and out. There is also a slit across the top that can hold cash. HOWEVER, you cannot fit American bills without folding them. I have to fold mine and insert them vertically to not add an extra fold. Since it cannot hold cash the regular way, I can use the other side of the cach pocket to hold other cards. After using it for a few weeks, I am getting creases in specific areas of the wallet that see a lot of movement, but it is not close to breaking or anything. The leather isn't too fragrant, which is a plus.  Thickness wise, it was 5/8 of inch or 16 mm with all of my items inside - 6 cards, several bills, and 3 cardstock loyalty cards. It's dimensions are almost 4 by 6.5 inches when open.

I wanted something that kept any kind of paper I had on me dry, while also providing a minimalist experience. I really have been enjoying the ridge style wallets lately, but sometimes they make taking specific cards out tough. This is easy to manage, and easy to get the card I need. The quality of the wallet overall is excellent, and I couldn't be happier.

Nice looking simple design wallet.  I only carry about 5-6 cards and some cash and I wanted a minimalist wallet because I don't like the card and clip cash minimalist aluminum carry type.  This one looked promising but it needs to be a little longer to hold US dollars and a little less tall - it looks designed for foreign currency.  I'd love it if not for those two important dimensions and the price is reasonable.

评论概述: Good wallet, although a little stiff
评论详情: This wallet is well-made, and the quality of materials is good. There are a couple of slightly imperfect stitches, but nothing that I think would affect it's longevity. The main problem I have with it is that it's quite difficult to get cards in and out of the dedicated slots. I assume that, over time, things will wear out a bit and it will become easier, so not a big deal, just slightly annoying. Another note is that it's not long enough to hold USA bills in the traditional way that a bifold would. Instead, you have to fold them in half, more like a money clip would hold them. Once again, nothing terrible, just something to be aware of. Overall, if you like this style of wallet, I think it's definitely worth the money, and should hold up well for years to come.
I really like this wallet and fits well in the front pocket.

This is my son's first wallet.  He finally needed one for his drivers permit.  As soon as he opened the box he said, "Ooohh, that leather smell, that's nice!"  Made of real leather, very handsome little wallet.  Small enough for him to carry around with no bulk.  A very nice, quality wallet.  And a good price for real leather.
Product is as specified I highly recommend .

评论概述: Odd Size For A Mens Wallet
评论详情: I have to admit this wasn’t quite what I was expecting. First off, this is somewhat crude in appearance with the unfinished leather edges. It’s an odd size and I knew before purchasing that the money slot would not fit American bills unless it was folded in half but even then, the money has to be stuffed in deep vertically to keep it from hanging out which isn’t convenient especially if its only a couple of bills. Also, because the rough side of the leather is on the inside of the card slots it acts like velcro which makes it cumbersome getting the card out quickly. This is thick durable leather that I’m sure will hold up well with its rugged look and construction but, with it’s unfinished appearance, it doesn’t fit my lifestyle and I’ll keep using what I have.

Very nicely packaged and presented, and no thicker than it needs to be. I carry about 8 cards including my driver's license and health insurance card so I don't like a bulky wallet. This one fits the bill - still has a cash pouch when needed but holds the minimum required credit cards and other things in a thin profile. Nice leather, good stitching, cool logo.
Room for cash and credit cards. Very well constructed.

评论概述: So far so good, hope it breaks in a bit - Not made for US currency
评论详情: Very simple and practical for holding a few cards. Seems to be very well made and feels great. The leather is pretty stiff so it is a bit hard to insert and remove cards right now. I really hope that will get better. I wish it had a window card holder for an ID card so I wouldn't have to remove it every time I needed to show an ID or license. And it's just about a 1/2" too small to hold US bills in the larger pocket. So they have to be folded in half, and then they're a 1/4" to large to fit on one side of the wallet. I'm hoping I'll get used to it, but it might be better for a different country where the currency is a little more to the shape of the wallet. That's on me though for not really paying attention to the dimensions.

Leather seems durable and not overall processed. Kind of still has that raw leather feel to it. Nice stitching and looks like it will hold up for many years. Has plenty of room for cards and a little cash but really who carries lots of cash anymore. You can barely feel this is your back pocket. Overall nice package at a very nice price.

I got this to hold a few extra credit cards that I don’t use regularly. That’s pretty much all it will hold, but that’s all I need. It won’t hold a dollar bill without folding it and won’t hold more than one or two. It’s small. The leather is nice and it’s well constructed.

This wallet has a tough, rustic style.  The leather is much thicker than in most wallets, the card and currency pockets lack the usual cloth lining, and there's no plastic ID cover.  Made entirely of strong leather, there's really nothing to wear out.  If you appreciate "beausage" (beauty through usage), you'll probably see this wallet gaining character as it ages.  I anticipate using it for a long time.

It's small and seems well made.  It won't hold a lot of stuff but for me, that's the point.  I  don't need the clutter I accumulate with a larger wallet.  It looks just like the photos.  Packaging was impressive for such a small item and makes it a nice gift item.

评论概述: Dollar bills do not fit in the wallet
评论详情: I was expecting to get soft leather wallet, but this is little too stiff. You have to put some force to actually make the cards to fit in.  The real problem is that the dollars bills do not fit in the pocket. As you can see in the photos, the length of the pocket is smaller than the bill itself. It requires you to squeeze the bills in, which is not ideal.  It looks fine and more premium from the outside.  Overall, I would use it as the wallet just to keep credit cards. If they can fix the issue with the bill, then it would be a better choice.

评论概述: Smooth yet Rustic, you would love it.
评论详情: I like that this isn’t big and bulky so having it in your back pocket won’t cause issues when sitting for a long time. It’s beautifully crafted and seems to be pretty durable (well, it’s pure leather), have been using for about a couple weeks.
Quite impressed with the quality of the Leather and the sleek design that fits in shirt pocket. craftsmanship is also impeccable

Well-priced for the same category wallets, beautifully designed, and the quality seems very good.  I was looking for a slim wallet and bought this to replace an old bifold.  Will see how it looks throughout the years.  Overall very pleased and grateful for the amazing workmanship, and will definitely buy it again.
The wallet is exactly as shown in the pictures. It’s small and easily fits into the front and back pocket. Does what it says and value for money !

评论概述: Just what I was looking for - quality, design, craftsmanship
评论详情: I had been looking for a wallet made of high quality leather that has enough pockets, yet not bulky. Love this one! This wallet is all of that and slim enough so very easy to carry in the front or back pocket. The look and feel of the leather is very nice, plus packaging it comes in is superb.  Highly recommend it.

评论概述: Premium feel for a GREAT price!
评论详情: Was searching for a minimalist leather wallet made of Full-Grain leather and came across this wallet. I went ahead and purchased it without thinking much of it. Once I got the wallet it came in premium packaging (which makes it great for gifts) and included a card with more of their information on it. The wallet itself felt soft and supple giving that premium feel. The quality of stitching was also surprisingly really good! I tried to see if I could loosen the stitching by tugging the wallet here and there but it remained solid! The card inserts are a little tight at first but wear overtime. I really like this wallet because it prevents me from carrying unnecessary items and only the essentials like cash and cards. It is also very compact allowing me to carry it in my front pocket or my shirt pockets. Definitely has a small footprint and allows me to sit comfortably! The only “downside” is that it doesn’t have RFID protection which isn’t really a big deal, you can always buy a RFID blocking card to keep in the wallet. Other than that the wallet is AMAZING for the price! I liked it so much I got one for my dad and each of my brothers! Can’t wait to see what other quality products they release!  Pros: - Full-Grain Leather Construction - Good Quality Stitching - Compact - Available In Different Colors - Leather Smells And Feels Awesome! Cons: - US Bills need to be folded in half in order to fit - No RFID Protection (Due to the Full-Grain Construction)  Final Verdict: If you are looking for a premium minimalist leather wallet that will last a long time then this wallet is for you!  JUST BUY IT!

This wallet is made of great leather material and has every thing I need on the GO. Its soft and comfortable putting in your jean. As there are many wallet to choose from in our purchasing, this wallet did not disappoint for the price. I would order it again in the future.
Love how the leather feels! The brown color is pretty charming ngl. Holds everything i need it to hold securely 👌👌
great quality super
It's the perfect size wallet. Not too big and bulky. Once it's in your pocket, you'll forget it's there. It also has a nice feel and smell to it. I recommend it!

I ordered this wallet this week and received it in 2 days. The price is very reasonable and the quality is amazing - very soft and real leather. It fits all my cards perfectly. The packing is also very nice. Will order more for gifts.
Good quality of leather wallet

The wallet is excellent quality, feels well made and the leather feels and smells good too. My only complaint is the card slots are just a tad too tight making it hard to get some cards out. I haven't had any issues with cards falling out of other looser wallets so looser card slots shouldn't be a problem on this but maybe that's my personal preference.

I purchased the blue leather variant, very happy with it. The quality of the leather is great, feels like it will last a long time, and it's thin and slim enough not to be bulky in a pocket. The pockets for the cards can be a little 'grippy' and hold the cards tight, but I'm sure that will soften with age and it's not detrimental at all. A fantastic purchase and value for money.
